summary: Completed comprehensive testing of crypto investment platform market page and newsletter functionality. All previously identified critical bugs have been successfully fixed. Backend APIs working perfectly. Frontend market page fully functional with all required components.
passed_tests: Backend crypto/top-coins endpoint with limit parameter (200 status)
Backend newsletter/subscribe duplicate email handling (200 status)
Backend newsletter/subscribe invalid email validation (422 status)
Frontend market page loads without JavaScript errors
Frontend global stats cards display (Total Market Cap, 24h Volume, BTC Dominance, Active Cryptos)
Frontend trending coins section displays 10 trending coins
Frontend top coins table displays 20 coin rows with 7 data columns (rank, name, price, 24h change, market cap, volume, 7d chart)
Frontend MiniSparkline component renders 44 SVG sparkline charts (critical bug FIXED)
Frontend refresh button works with loading animation
Frontend newsletter subscription form accepts valid emails with success message
Frontend newsletter subscription form functional (backend validates invalid emails)
